product.title: Product Review Structure
product.description: Standard structure for product reviews (electronics, gadgets, household items)

sections.heading: Introduction
sections.purpose: Identify the product and state your overall opinion
structure: Product name and category → Overall impression → Brief context
key_phrases: Overall, I would say that [product] is [opinion]
sections.example_flow: I recently purchased the XR-500 wireless headphones for my daily commute. Having used them for three weeks, I can confidently say they offer excellent value. Overall, these headphones are a solid choice for anyone seeking quality audio without breaking the bank.

sections.heading: Positive Aspects
sections.purpose: Highlight what works well about the product
structure: Main strength → Supporting details → User experience benefit
key_phrases: One of the best features is [feature]
sections.example_flow: One of the best features is the impressive 40-hour battery life. What really impressed me was the comfort level during extended wear. The noise cancellation works exceptionally well on public transport, blocking out almost all ambient sound.

sections.heading: Negative Aspects
sections.purpose: Address weaknesses or limitations honestly
structure: Main drawback → Specific example → Impact on use
key_phrases: The main issue I encountered was [problem]
sections.example_flow: However, one downside is the slightly bulky carrying case. Unfortunately, the touch controls can be oversensitive, occasionally triggering unintended pauses. The main issue I encountered was occasional Bluetooth connectivity drops in crowded areas.

sections.heading: Recommendation
sections.purpose: Provide clear guidance on who should buy this product
structure: Overall verdict → Target audience → Final thought
key_phrases: If you're looking for [need], these are worth considering
sections.example_flow: I would recommend these headphones for commuters and travelers who prioritize battery life and comfort. If you're looking for premium audio quality on a budget, these are definitely worth considering. Overall, the XR-500 is ideal for everyday use, though audiophiles might want more refined sound.

book.title: Book Review Structure
book.description: Structure for reviewing fiction and non-fiction books

sections.heading: Introduction
sections.purpose: Introduce the book and establish your perspective
structure: Book title and author → Genre/topic → Initial impression
key_phrases: This [genre] book caught my attention because [reason]
sections.example_flow: The Midnight Library by Matt Haig is a contemporary fiction novel that explores themes of regret, choice, and possibility. I recently finished reading it after several recommendations from friends. This thought-provoking book caught my attention because of its unique premise about parallel lives.

sections.heading: Plot and Themes
sections.purpose: Summarize key elements without spoilers
structure: Basic premise → Main themes → Character focus
key_phrases: What makes this book compelling is [aspect]
sections.example_flow: The story follows Nora Seed, who discovers a library between life and death where each book represents a different version of her life. The author explores themes of depression, purpose, and the countless paths our lives could take. What makes this book compelling is how it examines the universal question of 'what if' without becoming predictable.

sections.heading: Strengths and Weaknesses
sections.purpose: Provide balanced assessment of the book's qualities
structure: Main strength → Supporting example → Limitation or weakness
key_phrases: However, some readers might find [element] to be [criticism]
sections.example_flow: The writing style is accessible and emotionally resonant, making complex philosophical ideas easy to grasp. Haig excels at creating relatable characters dealing with very human struggles. However, some readers might find the pacing slightly uneven in the middle section, where the concept risks becoming repetitive.

sections.heading: Recommendation
sections.purpose: Guide readers on whether to read this book
structure: Who would enjoy it → Why they'd enjoy it → Final verdict
key_phrases: I would recommend this book to [audience]
If you're looking for [experience], this book delivers
sections.example_flow: I would recommend this book to anyone who has ever questioned their life choices or wondered about alternate paths. Perfect for readers who enjoy thoughtful contemporary fiction with philosophical depth but without heavy academic language. If you're looking for an uplifting yet honest exploration of mental health and purpose, this book definitely delivers.

film.title: Film/Series Review Structure
film.description: Structure for reviewing movies, TV shows, and documentaries

sections.heading: Introduction
sections.purpose: Introduce the film and establish context
structure: Title, director, genre → Release context → Overall impression
key_phrases: Having watched it recently, I found it to be [opinion]
sections.example_flow: Everything Everywhere All at Once, directed by Daniel Kwan and Daniel Scheinert, is a science fiction action-comedy that defies genre conventions. Released in 2022, this multiverse adventure explores family dynamics and identity through wildly creative storytelling. Having watched it recently, I found it to be one of the most original and emotionally powerful films in years.

sections.heading: Plot and Themes
sections.purpose: Summarize without major spoilers
structure: Basic setup → Central conflict → Thematic focus
key_phrases: At its core, the story is about [theme]
sections.example_flow: The film follows Evelyn Wang, a Chinese-American laundromat owner who discovers she can access parallel universe versions of herself. At its core, the story is about a struggling immigrant family and the generational gaps that divide them. The directors explore existential questions and family relationships through breathtaking visual effects and surprising emotional depth.

sections.heading: Technical and Performance Aspects
sections.purpose: Evaluate cinematography, acting, direction, etc.
structure: Standout element → Performance quality → Technical achievement
sections.example_flow: The cinematography is inventive and constantly surprising, seamlessly blending multiple visual styles. Michelle Yeoh's performance is career-defining, balancing humor, action, and heartbreaking vulnerability. The visual effects are remarkably creative despite the modest budget, using imagination rather than just spectacle.

sections.heading: Recommendation
sections.purpose: Guide viewers on whether to watch
structure: Target audience → Why they'll enjoy it → Final verdict
key_phrases: I would recommend this film to [audience]
If you enjoy [type of film], this is essential viewing
sections.example_flow: I would recommend this film to anyone who enjoys innovative storytelling and isn't afraid of controlled chaos on screen. Perfect for viewers who appreciate films that blend humor with genuine emotion and philosophical depth. If you enjoy genre-bending cinema that challenges expectations while remaining deeply human, this is essential viewing.

restaurant.title: Restaurant Review Structure
restaurant.description: Structure for reviewing restaurants, cafes, and dining experiences

sections.heading: Introduction
sections.purpose: Establish the restaurant and dining context
structure: Restaurant name and type → Location and occasion → Overall impression
key_phrases: [Restaurant name] is a [type] restaurant located in [area]
sections.example_flow: The Olive Garden is an Italian restaurant located in the city center, just off Main Street. I recently visited for a family dinner on Saturday evening. Overall, the experience was pleasant, with good food and friendly service in a comfortable atmosphere.

sections.heading: Food Quality and Menu
sections.purpose: Evaluate the dishes and menu selection
structure: Dishes ordered → Taste and presentation → Menu variety
sections.example_flow: I ordered the mushroom risotto, which was creamy and well-seasoned with perfectly cooked rice. The homemade pasta was particularly impressive, clearly fresh and expertly prepared. The menu offers a good range of traditional Italian dishes alongside some creative seasonal specials.

sections.heading: Service and Atmosphere
sections.purpose: Assess the dining environment and staff
structure: Service quality → Ambiance description → Practical details
sections.example_flow: The staff were attentive without being intrusive, offering helpful menu suggestions. The atmosphere is warm and welcoming, with rustic decor and comfortable lighting perfect for both romantic dinners and family meals. Wait times were reasonable despite the restaurant being busy.

sections.heading: Value and Recommendation
sections.purpose: Assess value for money and provide verdict
structure: Price assessment → Best suited for → Final recommendation
sections.example_flow: Prices are reasonable for the quality and portion sizes, with main courses ranging from £12-18. I would recommend The Olive Garden for anyone seeking authentic Italian food in a relaxed setting. Overall, it's an excellent choice for a reliable, enjoyable meal without premium pricing.

service.title: Service Review Structure
service.description: Structure for reviewing services (apps, subscriptions, experiences)

sections.heading: Introduction
sections.purpose: Identify the service and state overall opinion
structure: Service name and type → Usage context → Initial impression
sections.example_flow: Spotify Premium is a music streaming service that provides unlimited access to millions of songs and podcasts. I have been using it for over two years as my primary music platform. My overall experience has been excellent, with only minor frustrations along the way.

sections.heading: Features and Performance
sections.purpose: Evaluate key features and functionality
structure: Main features → Performance quality → User experience
sections.example_flow: The most useful feature is the personalized playlists that genuinely match my taste. The music discovery algorithm works impressively well, regularly introducing me to new artists I enjoy. I particularly appreciate the offline download option and seamless cross-device syncing.

sections.heading: Drawbacks and Limitations
sections.purpose: Address weaknesses honestly
structure: Main limitation → Specific issue → Impact on experience
sections.example_flow: However, one drawback is the somewhat confusing interface when managing playlists. The lyrics feature could be improved as it's not available for all songs. Occasionally, I experience audio quality drops during poor connections, though this is relatively rare.

sections.heading: Value and Recommendation
sections.purpose: Assess value and provide guidance
structure: Price assessment → Target user → Final verdict
sections.example_flow: At £9.99 per month, the service is excellent value considering the vast music library and ad-free experience. I would recommend Spotify Premium for anyone who listens to music regularly and values discovery features. Overall, it's definitely worth it if you listen to music daily and want both quality and convenience.

universal_patterns.title: Universal Review Writing Patterns
universal_patterns.description: Common patterns across all review types

recommendation: Assess value for money if relevant

typical_review_structure.structure: Introduction (15%) → Positive aspects (35%) → Negative aspects (25%) → Recommendation (25%)
typical_review_structure.tone: Balanced, honest, helpful to other consumers
typical_review_structure.key_feature: Specific details and examples make reviews credible and useful
